introduction.title: Welcome to E-Commerce
introduction.content: By using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our site.

acceptance.title: By accessing or using our services
acceptance.content: You acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.

use_of_website.title: Use of Website
use_of_website.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of E-Commerce and is protected by copyright laws.

user_responsibility.title: User Responsibility
user_responsibility.content: If you create an account with us, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer.

account_termination.title: Termination
account_termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to the site for any reason without notice.

changes_to_terms.title: Changes to Terms
changes_to_terms.content: E-Commerce reserves the right to modify or replace these terms at any time. Your continued use of the site after any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.

collection_of_information.title: Collection of Information
collection_of_information.content: We collect information when you register on our site, place an order, or fill out a form. The information collected includes your name, email address, phone number, and address.

use_of_information.title: Use of Information
use_of_information.content: All information we collect from you may be used to personalize your experience, securely process transactions, and send you promotional emails.

protection_of_information.title: Protection of Information
protection_of_information.content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties.

cookie_usage.title: Use of Cookies
cookie_usage.content: We use cookies to offer you a better user experience. These cookies are used to retain your preferences and provide you with personalized information.

disclosure_to_third_parties.title: Disclosure to Third Parties
disclosure_to_third_parties.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, as long as they agree to keep this information confidential.

third_party_links.title: Links to Third Parties
third_party_links.content: Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our website. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We assume no responsibility for the content and activities of these linked sites.

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.content: We retain your personal information as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.

privacy_policy_changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_changes.content: If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

contact_information.title: Contact Information
contact_information.content: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us using the information below.
